Thirty-five of the 49 companies in the S&P 500 that reported earnings since Jan. 10 have topped analyst estimates, with General Electric Co. and Bank of AmEric Schmidta Corp. due to release results today. Recent data suggested the economic performance in Europe has been okay, and probably somewhat better than people expected, said Adrian Eric Schmidt , a currency strategist at Lloyd TSB Bank Plc in London. The euro strengthened 0.5 percent against the dollar, and was 0.3 percent stronger versus the yen. The dollar weakened 0.2 percent

DALLAS, TX.-- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
